mapper.select: SELECT cr.* FROM chatRoom cr JOIN chatMembers cm ON cr.room_seq = cm.room_seq WHERE cm.emp_seq = #{empSeq} ORDER BY cr.room_create_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatMembers (emp_seq, room_seq, member_role) VALUES (#{empSeq}, #{roomSeq}, 'MEMBER')

INSERT INTO ChatMessage (message_seq, message_content, message_type, send_time, room_seq, sender_seq) VALUES (message_sequence.NEXTVAL, #{messageContent, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{messageType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{roomSeq}, #{senderSeq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ChatMessage WHERE room_seq = #{roomSeq} ORDER BY send_time ASC
SELECT e.emp_seq, e.emp_name, e.emp_avatar, cm.member_role FROM Employee e JOIN ChatMembers cm ON e.emp_seq = cm.emp_seq WHERE cm.room_seq = #{roomSeq}

SELECT employee.emp_seq, employee.emp_name, employee.emp_avatar, role.role_name, department.dept_name FROM employee JOIN department ON employee.dept_code = department.dept_code JOIN role ON employee.role_code = role.role_code

SELECT e.emp_seq, e.emp_avatar, e.emp_name, e.emp_email, r.role_name, d.dept_name, e.emp_tel, e.emp_birth, r.role_code FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.dept_code = d.dept_code JOIN role r ON e.role_code = r.role_code WHERE e.emp_seq = #{empSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notifications (notification_seq, notification_type, message_seq, emp_seq) VALUES (notification_sequence.NEXTVAL, #{notificationType}, #{messageSeq}, #{empSeq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Notifications WHERE emp_seq = #{empSeq} ORDER BY create_date DESC
